items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Puedes pedirlo en una talla menos
items.body: Muy buenito es en franela y se puede pedir una talla menos Read more
items.author: Linda Jaramillo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the style and quality
items.body: I love this dress. From the style to the fabric I have no complaints. The one thing to note and this is a personal preference is the slit. I thought it could be smaller for me because I have shorter legs. The colors are as pictured and I am definitely thinking about getting other colors. You can dress this up or down all you need is a different style of shoes and maybe hair style. I would recommend this dress. Material is soft and not cheap or sea through. The price is fine, always love discounts. But I wouldn’t say this is ver over priced. Read more
items.author: Lily C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Fall!
items.body: Just perfect for fall, you can dress it down or up. Color is as expected. I’m 5’ feet tall and 170 lbs and the Large fit perfect it disguises my belly, length wise it goes all the way down to my ankles. Read more
items.author: Manuel Aceves

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love the brown
items.body: This is NOT cocktail attire..it’s like t-shirt material. You can style it with cute boots or heels but please don’t wear this to someone’s wedding lol. The brown color is nice and the fit is good, it RUNS BIG. I am normally an xl, ordered a large and I’m glad I sized down. The top sits a little funny, but overall this is SO comfortable, I can’t wait to wear it. 3 stars, I think it’s a little expensive for what it is. The material is medium weight, again like a t shirt. Read more
items.author: Blair

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Jean Okunsanya
items.body: Fabric very thin. Waist is long. Not as elegant as the model. Read more
items.author: Jean Okunsanya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress.
items.body: Fits great, nice material. Love it. Read more
items.author: Jan J Andru

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ick
items.body: Doesn’t fit right. Very high slit, cheap material Read more
items.author: jess

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT
items.body: Don’t hesitate….just buy it. I hate my gut and stomach, but with a little shapewear it smoothed out so nicely. I wore it to a wedding and had so many compliments. Very true to size. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Cocktail Boat Neck Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Cocktail Boat Neck Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Dark Grey, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
